title: SearchArgs
description: Schema for unified search tool arguments. Defines input validation for semantic/keyword search with automatic fallback behavior.

limit.description: Maximum number of results to return

mode.description: Search mode: auto, semantic, keyword, or hybrid

depth.description: Relation depth: follow wikilinks N levels from results (0-3)

full_context.description: When true, include full note content instead of snippets (limited to 5000 chars per note)
